actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of the Treasury, acting through the United States Customs Service, should conduct investigations into, and take such other actions as are necessary to prevent, the unreported importation of ginseng products into the United States from foreign countries.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of the Treasury should, to the maximum extent practicable, conduct investigations into, and take such other actions necessary to prevent, the importation of ginseng products into the United States from foreign countries (including Canada and Asian countries), unless the importation is reported to the United States Customs Service as required by Federal law.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of the Treasury, acting through the United States Customs Service, should conduct investigations into, and take such other actions as are necessary to prevent, the unreported importation of ginseng products into the United States from foreign countries.
